directions: Heat soy milk in a saucepan over medium heat until it just starts to simmer, 3 to 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Add chocolate chips and let sit for 1 minute. Stir with a wire whisk until smooth and creamy. Add powdered sugar and vanilla extract; stir again until incorporated. Use warm as a drizzle or refrigerate and beat using an electric mixer for a spreadable frosting.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) bag vegan semisweet chocolate chips
title: Vegan Chocolate Ganache
